entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, North East Margaree
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 03:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: NE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early in the evening and ending near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023
